Module contents¶

class tess.states.BaseState(automation)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for the actuator

Communicate to the Actuator API to control the operation.

Keep the state of the actuator device.

Record the current event to the TESS cloud server.

state_check(state_name)[source]¶

Called with each sensor measurement period

Parameters:state_name ([str]) – state name as a string being used for check rules
state_exit()[source]¶

Called when the experiment ends. Before exiting the state, add a new data point using analysis object
